<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>With the changes in Jakarta release, a new column has been added to resource_event_color table named "type" of type choice list pointing to the choices of category column in time_card table. This fix script will copy the values of the column event_type to type if the value of event_type is a valid choice for the column type</description>
        <name>Copy event types in resource_event_color</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.log('RMJakartaUpgrade: Copying event_type values to type column');
var choiceList = GlideScriptChoiceList.getChoiceList('resource_event_color', 'type');
choiceList.removeNone();
var gr = new GlideRecord('resource_event_color');
gr.addNotNullQuery('event_type');
gr.query();
while (gr.next()) {
	var eventType = gr.getValue('event_type');
	if (eventType == 'task')
		eventType = 'task_work';
	var eventTypeIsValid = !gs.nil(choiceList.getChoice(eventType));
	if (eventTypeIsValid) {
		gr.setValue('type', eventType);
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.update();
	}
}
gs.log('RMJakartaUpgrade: Finished copying event_type values to type column');]]></script>
